title: NZ time on OCE server
body: My acc had a 14 day suspension and it is past the time it shows. But i live in NZ and was wondering if the OCE server is based on Aus time?

replies.body: I believe it might show ban times in AEST but I'm not sure at all of that tbh. If it doesn't say AEST I would assume it's meant to be local time, but either way if the suspension is still active beyond the AEST time submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
